title.narrative: 2019 Hanga Ahazaza - Ecosystem Strengthening: Chamber of Tourism

description.narrative:
The program will deliver on the following three objectives:
1. Build the capacity of the Tourism Chamber Secretariat and association members through tailored training and technical assistance to comply with international standards and foster SME’s growth in the Tourism and Hospitality sector in Rwanda. 2. Support the effective advocacy to ensure enabling regulatory environment that promote the tourism and hospitality sector of Rwanda. 3. To strengthen financial self- reliance and operation autonomy for Tourism Chamber secretariat by ensuring effective and efficient membership mobilization within the Tourism & Hospitality sector in Rwanda.
